issue.description: Adding new subtypes to an application object that is defined ein another application module may add mappings. Does that mean we add another spec in *this* module? If so, need to document and fix xsl.
type limit_qualifier_list is extensible while it was by intent not in AP214. Do you have a reason to keep it extensible?
In the mapping of value_limit.limit_qualifier, the type_qualifier name shall be 'minimum' or 'maximum' (and not 'mim' and 'max').
In the non-tabular syntax of mapping specification, a global rule section shall contain the name of rules (and possibly their clause number in the MIM).
Remove the empty elements in the mapping specification in order to get rid of empty sections (e.g. source when MIM element=PATH)
